actions.text: The lamp lost its original white color. However, it performs its task greatly. So you have nothing to complain about it.
You stretch your hand towards the night table and turn on the lamp. "And here it is!" you murmur. Now you can see the whole room in its ordered minimalism.
A dark and massive wooden desk. How many nights you spent on it, bent over your books...

You put the chair near the desk and sit. You straighten up, noticing for the first time in this day that your shoulders hurt a lot, really. You dedicate some moments to observe with melancholy all the little signs carved on the wood by your ceaseless work.
A dark and massive wooden desk. How many nights you spent on it, bent over your books...
You put the chair near the desk and sit. You straighten up, noticing for the first time in this day that your shoulders hurt a lot, really. You need some minutes to analyze what's going on.
A dark and massive wooden desk. How many nights you spent on it, bent over your books... (Who knows if you could find other words to describe it, to appear less predictable, you know...)

You put the chair near the desk and sit. You straighten up, noticing for the first time in this day that your shoulders hurt a lot, really. You need some minutes to understand what's going on. However, you are feeling some annoying sense of repetitiveness...
A very comfortable upholstered chair.
You could never deny yourself the warm hug by your beloved chair.

You put the chair near the desk and sit. You straighten up, noticing for the first time in this day that your shoulders hurt a lot, really. You dedicate some moments to observe with melancholy all the little signs carved on the wood by your ceaseless work.
A very comfortable upholstered chair.
You could never deny yourself the warm hug by your beloved chair, even in a moment of confusion like this.
You put the chair near the desk and sit. You straighten up, noticing for the first time in this day that your shoulders hurt a lot, really. You need some minutes to analyze what's going on.
A very comfortable upholstered chair.
You could never deny yourself the warm hug by your beloved chair, even in a moment of confusion like this. Hey wait... again?

You put the chair near the desk and sit. You straighten up, noticing for the first time in this day that your shoulders hurt a lot, really. You need some minutes to understand what's going on. However, you are feeling some annoying sense of repetitiveness...
A black journal, so useful to write all the important stuff that an old man like you need to remember. A sheet of paper has been inserted between the pages.

Maybe you could need taking notes on other important facts or analyses about the formula during the daily activity. You decide to bring the journal with you. Your lack of memory is becoming really annoying...

The note reports a formula, written by Dr. Rowley. Yes, surely that is Dr. Rowley's calligraphy. Probably before separating yourselves, he gave you this Formula to analyse. You look at it carefully. A smile opens on your face. Could it really be the most exciting discovery about the Time Jump theory that you and Dr. Tim Rowley reached in the last ten years?
To work the box needs a special procedure and successively the result of the formula. Without a help, you cannot remember.
With a trembling hand, you insert the result of the formula kept in your journal using the box number pad.
A black journal, so useful to write all the important stuff that an old man like you need to remember. A sheet of paper has been inserted between the pages. A... another one...

Maybe you could need taking notes on other important facts or analyses about the formula during the daily activity. You decide to bring the journal with you. Your lack of memory is becoming really annoying...

The note reports a formula, written by Dr. Rowley. Yes, surely that is Dr. Rowley's calligraphy. Probably before separating yourselves, he gave you this Formula to analyse. You look at it carefully. A smile opens on your face. Could it really be the most exciting discovery about the Time Jump theory that you and Dr. Tim Rowley reached in the last ten years? No... it cannot be. You need to talk to him to be sure about it.
The note reports a formula, but according to what Dr. Rowley told you, it wasn't written by him. Which is the mystery behind all of this?
To work the box needs a special procedure and successively the result of the formula. Without a help, you cannot remember.
You insert the result of the formula kept in your journal using the box number pad. It worked once, surely it will work twice.

A black journal, so useful to write all the important stuff that an old man like you need to remember. A sheet of paper has been inserted between the pages. A... another one... It must be the formula mentioned in the message.

Maybe you could need taking notes on other important facts or analyses about the formula during the daily activity. You decide to bring the journal with you. Your lack of memory is becoming really annoying... (I am sorry to spoil you, Dr. Loob, but I think the journal will be of no use in this round.)

The note reports a formula apparently written by Dr. Rowley. Yes, that seems Dr. Rowley's calligraphy. But you already know that some mysteries are hidden behind it. And seriously, you really thought that Dr. Rowley all alone could have reached a goal so important? Come on, Dr. Loob!

"I am you from a recent future. I just saved myself from a fire, flared mysteriously in the mansion. You will find Miss Lucy on the boulevard, but Dr. Rowley will be blocked in his rooms without the chance to escape. You must help him to survive and prepare yourself to use the box again. It's all in your hands, my dear Dr. Loob of the past."
To work the box needs a special procedure and the result of a specific formula.
You put the note in the box. You set the date, the time and the place. Sink or swim, right?

"I am you from a recent future. I just saved myself from a fire flared mysteriously in the mansion. You will find Miss Lucy in the boulevard. Dr. Rowley will be blocked in his rooms with no chance to escape. You must help him and prepare yourself to use the box again. It's all in your hands, my dear Dr. Loob of the past." You decide to take the strange message with you. It will prove to be really useful to analyse the facts.

"I am you from a recent future. I just saved myself from a fire flared mysteriously in the mansion. You will find Miss Lucy in the boulevard. Dr. Rowley will be blocked in his rooms with no chance to escape. You must help him and prepare yourself to use the box again. It's all in your hands, my dear Dr. Loob of the past." You decide to take the strange message with you. It will prove to be really useful to analyse the facts.
You put the note in the box. But there is no reason to send it back without any new instructions. You have to pick it back and collect other information.

From the careful observation of the mansion, you have deducted that the fire has broken out from the kitchen or the adjacent cellar. Also, talking to Dr. Rowley, you have discovered he didn't find any formula enabling the time travel. But you already know that, right? A mystery that must be solved! You quickly join some lines on the strange message.

"I am you from a recent future. I just saved myself from a fire flared mysteriously in the mansion. You will find Miss Lucy in the boulevard. Dr. Rowley will be blocked in his rooms with no chance to escape. You must help him and prepare yourself to use the box again. It's all in your hands, my dear Dr. Loob of the past. "In a disjointed row, it continues: "In a different timeline I saved Dr. Rowley and know for sure that Miss Lucy is not in danger. Therefore, there is a mysterious series of events to understand, because it's not Rowley the one who wrote the formula. Go to the kitchen."
To work the box needs a special procedure and the result of a specific formula.
You put the note in the box. You set the date, the time and the place. You know, time flies when you're having fun...

"I am you from a recent future. I just saved myself from a fire flared mysteriously in the mansion. You will find Miss Lucy in the boulevard. Dr. Rowley will be blocked in his rooms with no chance to escape. You must help him and prepare yourself to use the box again. It's all in your hands, my dear Dr. Loob of the past. "In a disjointed row, it continues: "In a different timeline I saved Dr. Rowley and know for sure that Miss Lucy is not in danger. Therefore, there is a mysterious series of events to understand, because it's not Rowley the one who wrote the formula. Go to the kitchen."

"I am you from a recent future. I just saved myself from a fire flared mysteriously in the mansion. You will find Miss Lucy in the boulevard. Dr. Rowley will be blocked in his rooms with no chance to escape. You must help him and prepare yourself to use the box again. It's all in your hands, my dear Dr. Loob of the past. "In a disjointed row, it continues: "In a different timeline I saved Dr. Rowley and know for sure that Miss Lucy is not in danger. Therefore, there is a mysterious series of events to understand, because it's not Rowley the one who wrote the formula. Go to the kitchen."
Miss Lucy is surely doing a good job with these yellow narcissuses. They are growing strong and beautiful.
Miss Lucy is surely doing a good job with these yellow narcissuses. They are growing strong and beautiful. A sort of sad melancholy is increasing inside you.
I really cannot believe you are looking here and there... You had so little time and wasted it in this way.
Outside the window you can see the huge distance that separates the mansion from the village. There is no chance to meet randomly one of the villagers near the property. What a pity. Or not?
You open the window. Fresh air invades the antechamber together with the inebriating scent of the narcissuses.

Outside the window you can see the huge distance that separates the mansion from the village. There is no chance to meet randomly one of the villagers near the property. You and your fellows are completely alone...
You open the window. Fresh air invades the antechamber... What are you doing, Dr. Loob? You close the window immediately to restrict the quantity of oxygen available to the fire.
I really cannot believe you are looking here and there... You had so little time and wasted it in this way.
This desk meticulously ordered shows to humanity Dr. Loob's well known scrupulousness. Well... Actually, nobody else but you can come in the studio...
This desk meticulously ordered appears to conflict with your actual state of mind.
The blueprint depicts the whole procedure for the use of the box for Time Jumps, designed by you and Dr. Rowley.
Today is the scheduled day for the first tests. So it is better to bring the blueprint with you and head to the lab, where you are going to meet Dr. Rowley.
Following all the steps indicated on the blueprint, you succeed in powering up the box.
The blueprint depicts the whole procedure for the use of the box for Time Jumps, designed by you and Dr. Rowley.

The blueprint is fundamental to the activation of the box. Even if you are sure about nothing at all, the thought that you succeeded once with the message convinces you that probably you can manage it twice.
Following all the steps indicated on the blueprint, you succeed in powering up the box.
You are very old, but that smart eye and that pleasant smile make you a very cool one, right?
You are very old... Will you be able to solve this unbelievable situation?

This painting makes you deeply proud. It is an example of a great talent. The only one you have ever recognized. Somebody convinced you to hide a safe behind it. What a crime to make a masterpiece so wonderful also useful.
Is there a real reason to move the painting from its right place? Not this time.
Behind the painting there is the safe where all the keys of the mansion are stored away.
You remove the painting from the wall by revealing the steel safe. Then you place it on the floor with the greatest care.
I really cannot believe you are looking here and there... You had so little time and wasted it in this way.
I really cannot believe you are looking here and there... You had so little time and wasted it in this way.
A common red fire extinguisher. But, you know, it's very important to follow the basic security rules.
A common red fire extinguisher, that in this situation can really save your life and those of Dr. Rowley and Miss Lucy.
It's not the place to use it. Concentrate, Dr. Loob!
Quickly! Pick the fire extinguisher! You have to handle this!

Keeping you at the sides of the door, you open it slightly with one hand. When the burst of flame appears to be stabilized, you use the fire extinguisher and succeed in creating just a restricted way to proceed.
A common red fire extinguisher, that in this situation can really save your life and those of Dr. Rowley and Miss Lucy.
It's not the place to use it. Concentrate, Dr. Loob!
Quickly! Pick the fire extinguisher! You have to handle this!

Keeping you at the sides of the door, you open it slightly with one hand. When the burst of flame appears to be stabilized, you use the fire extinguisher and succeed in creating just a restricted way to proceed.

You and Dr. Rowley keep at the sides of the door, you slightly open it with one hand. When the burst of flame appears to be stabilized, you use the fire extinguisher and succeed in creating just a restricted way to proceed.
It's better to check if there is something else usable. You need to pay close attention to the optimization of your key items.
I really cannot believe you are looking here and there... You had so little time and wasted it in this way.
A very common door.
You know that Dr. Rowley is going to be in great danger. You have to find the door key as soon as possible.
The door is locked. No matter what, you need the key to open it.
I really cannot believe you are looking here and there... You had so little time and wasted it in this way.
You love the quietness of the landscape. You don't need anything else. Maybe.
Morning fresh air gives a nice feeling of youth to your old skin.
You have always loved the quietness of the landscape. But in this situation of uncertainty, it increases your sense of solitude.
Morning fresh air would give a nice feeling of youth to your old skin, but it's a better decision not to open any windows.
I really cannot believe you are looking here and there... You had so little time and wasted it in this way.
A very common steel safe. You have to insert the right combination.
Dammit! You don't remember the combination... Stupid old man! You must have written it somewhere.
A shiny key with a plate. It says: "Door for Dr. Rowley's area."
You open the door, heading to Dr. Rowley's rooms. You have to find and save him, no matter what.
You look through the window to verify quickly the actual progress of the fire. You can easily deduct that for some unknown reason it has spread from the kitchen or the cellar.
There is no reason to help fire growing thanks to all the oxygen can enter from a window, isn't there?

Unluckily, after accepting the idea of their purchase from his cousin Annabel, Dr. Rowley never found a more useful role for them but containing some plants almost dead and the water, which he thought would miraculously revive them. Maybe they will reveal themselves useful in a situation like this.
The vases are too heavy to pick. Maybe with a little effort they could push them across the studio.
No need to use them now. You have to look for Dr. Rowley before.
No time to waste now. With all your strength, you push the vases until the door to Dr. Rowley's bedroom and pour the water over it.
The door to Dr. Rowley's bedroom is covered by fire completely. It's not possible coming in. The flames are too high. You have to find out a way to extinguish them.
Although the flames nearly covering the whole door, you try to open it.
Dr. Rowley is very scared. The sweat is coming down his face, and his shirt is completely stuck on his body. His messy hair covers his forehead. Fortunately, he seems unharmed.
"Dr. Loob, I... I..." "There is no time now. We have to run outside. We'll talk later, ok?"
Oh, these books tell the long story of the effort you and Dr. Rowley had addressed in the research about time jumps.
You cannot choose only one to pick.

Oh, these books tell the long story of the effort you and Dr. Rowley had addressed in the research about time jumps. You hope not to lose them, and with them all your knowledge. You have only one way to save all of this: succeeding in the mission.
Dr. Loob, come on. No time to lose!
It is a high bureau worn by the years.

You open the drawers one after another. Inside you can find pens, pencils, notebook still blank and a slip of paper with four numbers written on it. At the moment, you don't remember what they refer to. Besides, the inexplicable growing warm you are sensing in the Library pushes you to go away as soon as possible.
It is a high bureau worn by the years.

You open the drawers one after another, while you sense a growing warm in the Library. You are sure that the combination can be found among all these pens, pencils and notebooks. You have found it! Go, Dr. Loob, go!
A combination of four numbers, representing the year of the meeting with Dr. Rowley at the University of the capital. You were his professor of theoretical physics.

You read the combination noted on the slip of paper and as quick as possible you move the control knob towards the correct digits. The safe opens, and you pick the keys of the mansion. Now you can save Dr. Rowley.
It is an opaque glass window whom the sun rays still feeble cannot overreach. You can see some strange red reflexes move on the glass. You have to ask Miss Lucy or Dr. Rowley for a countercheck.
It is an opaque glass window whom the sun rays still feeble cannot overreach. You can see some strange red reflexes move on the glass. So it's already begun?!
The meeting table is full of books and sheets of paper. A usual appearance for it.
You put near the table and lay your already aching hands on it. It's unpredictably warm to the touch.
The meeting table is full of books and sheets of paper. A usual appearance for it.
You put near the table and lay your already aching hands on it. It's unpredictably warm to the touch. Another clue that what the strange message said is real.
I really cannot believe you are looking here and there... You had so little time and wasted it in this way.
I really cannot believe you are looking here and there... You had so little time and wasted it in this way.
I really cannot believe you are looking here and there... You had so little time and wasted it in this way.
I really cannot believe you are looking here and there... You had so little time and wasted it in this way.
I really cannot believe you are looking here and there... You had so little time and wasted it in this way.
I really cannot believe you are looking here and there... You had so little time and wasted it in this way.
The door is blackened and very hot.
You open the door.
The door is blackened and very hot.
You open the door.
Luckily Dr. Rowley decided to wait your arrival rather than proceeding incautiously. He is a very clever guy, isn't he?
"Dr. Loob, I took the fire extinguisher in the corridor and I waited here for your arrival. Now we can proceed towards the entrance." "Give it to me, Dr. Rowley. We can do it. Stay back."
"Dr. Loob, I searched for the fire extinguisher in the corridor, but I didn't find it. Without it, we cannot proceed. It's too dangerous." "I took it, Dr. Rowley. We can do it. Stay back."
I really cannot believe you are looking here and there... You had so little time and wasted it in this way.
I really cannot believe you are looking here and there... You had so little time and wasted it in this way.
I really cannot believe you are looking here and there... You had so little time and wasted it in this way.
I really cannot believe you are looking here and there... You had so little time and wasted it in this way.
I really cannot believe you are looking here and there... You had so little time and wasted it in this way.
I really cannot believe you are looking here and there... You had so little time and wasted it in this way.
I really cannot believe you are looking here and there... You had so little time and wasted it in this way.
I really cannot believe you are looking here and there... You had so little time and wasted it in this way.
I really cannot believe you are looking here and there... You had so little time and wasted it in this way.
I really cannot believe you are looking here and there... You had so little time and wasted it in this way.
I really cannot believe you are looking here and there... You had so little time and wasted it in this way.
I really cannot believe you are looking here and there... You had so little time and wasted it in this way.
I really cannot believe you are looking here and there... You had so little time and wasted it in this way.
On the shelves there are bottles, preserves, fruits and all the food Miss Lucy has been able to amass there. One of the bottles seems missing.
You take one of the wine bottles. It will be a good enough weapon or, at least, this is your deep hope.
It is a bottle of red wine, Dr. Rowley's favourite one.
You decide to attack the man from behind. You lift the bottle, but before you can do anything...
You don't know what to do. The still lifted bottle seems to be your only solution. You decide to attack this Lance guy.
The glasses were part of an oil bottle.
No reason to do that.
The window is open. They use a lever or something to unhinge one of the shutters.
At the moment there is no valid reason to leave from the window. That could be your last and unique chance to escape...

There are stains of oil, poured out near the shelves. Inspecting carefully, you notice that across the kitchen there are oily footprints that go toward the door of the cellar. Before going on, it's better to find a weapon or something.
There are stains of oil, poured out near the shelves. Inspecting carefully, you notice that across the kitchen there are oily footprints that go toward the door of the cellar.
For now all the boiler parameters seem ok, but you have to decide quickly what to do.
You cannot reach the boiler.

From behind, you cannot see much of him. He has strong shoulders. He is tall. You can guess he is a young man from his strange pointy hair. You can never win against him in a fair fight. You have to cheat in some way.
"Who the hell are you?" you scream in the dark cellar...

Looking at him, you can note some resemblance to someone you know. But who? Lance is a young man around his twenties. A smile is on his face. And you can't really understand why. You are menacing him with a bottle and, also, he was handling with the boiler to create an explosion that could destroy all your life. Why in the hell is he smiling at you?

He is just crazy, or... "What are you doing here?" "I was causing the fire that would have destroyed the mansion and probably killing you or my father or..." No way. He is just crazy. "Who is your father?" "Oh, right. You cannot know." "Please, be kind and tell me!" "I am Dr. Rowley's son."

You walk towards the voice you have heard. It came from the outside of the Lab building. It seems a kind of moan. When you are near enough, you finally recognize Miss Lucy. A smile appears on your face.
Miss Lucy is moaning, desperate by the complete lack of possibilities to call anyone for help. The mansion is far away from the village centre and nobody could hear her screams.

"You are safe. I am so happy, Dr. Loob!" "I am happy to have found you too, Miss Lucy. Have you seen Dr. Rowley?" "I believe he is blocked in his rooms... When I become aware of the fire, the flames had already reached that area of the mansion..."
Miss Lucy is talking to Dr. Rowley without pause. She is safe and this sureness makes you smile of relief and joy.
"We all are safe. I am so happy, Dr. Loob!" "I am happy to have found you too, Miss Lucy."
Dr. Rowley has recovered his usual quietness. He's listening to Miss Lucy that apparently has no will to making him participate actively at the conversation.

You look at the burning mansion. From a quick examination you can put the start point of the fire in the east area of the ground floor. More precisely, in the kitchen or in the cellar. It's better to add this new information to the strange note found in your room. You search it in your pockets, but unluckly you can find nothing. It was the most convincing proof of the time jump for a reluctant guy like you. You cannot find any solution. Your mission is failed, Dr. Loop.

You look at the burning mansion. From a quick examination you can put the start point of the fire in the east area of the ground floor. More precisely, in the kitchen or in the cellar. It's better to add this new information to the strange note found in your room.
The clean walls of the lab succeed in calming you also in a moment like this.
You feel a really strange sensation... Why can the clean walls of the lab succeed in calming you also in a moment like this?
It's an old plan of a procedure proved to be non-working.
You detach the old plan from the wall and take it with you.
To work the box needs a special procedure and the result of a specific formula.
It's an old plan of a procedure proved to be non-working.
You detach the old plan from the wall and take it with you.
To work the box needs a special procedure and the result of a specific formula.
The box is unready for this, you know. But there is something interesting on that sheet of paper and certainly you have already analysed it too, haven't you? It will work.
To work the box needs a special procedure and the result of a specific formula.
To work the box needs a special procedure and the result of a specific formula. Without a help, you cannot remember.
You follow the correct procedure to initialize the box. Now you need the result of a specific formula to realize the time jump. But you without a help, cannot remember how reach that it.
You already used it. You are worried and thrilled at the same time. It is the goal of your whole life and in some mysterious way it is happening thanks to you and Dr. Rowley.
To work the box needs a special procedure and the result of a specific formula.
To work the box needs a special procedure and the result of a specific formula. Without a help, you cannot remember.
You follow the correct procedure to initialize the box. Now you need the result of a specific formula to realize the time jump. But you without a help, cannot remember how reach that it.
